item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, April 26, 2025 at 2:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. LLMs can see and hear without any training (37 points | 11 comments)
2. An end to all this prostate trouble? (196 points | 86 comments)
3. Watching o3 guess a photo's location is surreal, dystopian and entertaining (35 points | 10 comments)
4. The Friendship Recession: The Lost Art of Connecting (173 points | 108 comments)
5. Show HN: My self-written hobby OS is finally running on my vintage IBM ThinkPad (18 points | 8 comments)
6. Cloth (286 points | 32 comments)
7. Australian who ordered radioactive materials walks away from court (101 points | 112 comments)
8. I wrote a book called "Crap Towns". It seemed funny at the time (303 points | 214 comments)
9. Freshpaint (YC S19) is hiring back end and front end engineers (Remote, US only) ( | hide)
10. Berkeley Humanoid Lite – Open-source robot (197 points | 18 comments)
11. ICE Deports 3 U.S. Citizen Children Held Incommunicado Prior to the Deportation (160 points | 48 comments)
12. Backblaze: Mounting Losses, Lawsuits, Sham Accounting, Insider Selling (98 points | 37 comments)
13. Lossless LLM compression for efficient GPU inference via dynamic-length float (369 points | 108 comments)
14. Build your own antisocial writing rig with DOS and a $2 USB key (9 points | 1 comment)
15. Writing "/etc/hosts" breaks the Substack editor (582 points | 314 comments)
16. Mike Lindell's lawyers used AI to write brief–judge finds nearly 30 mistakes (99 points | 60 comments)
17. Wikipedia’s nonprofit status questioned by D.C. U.S. attorney (668 points | 588 comments)
18. Parallel ./configure (142 points | 116 comments)
19. Mobygratis – Free Moby music to empower your creative projects (68 points | 17 comments)
20. Show HN: I used OpenAI's new image API for a personalized coloring book service (254 points | 140 comments)
21. World Emulation via Neural Network (204 points | 37 comments)
22. Reproducibility project fails to validate dozens of biomedical studies (220 points | 107 comments)
23. Show HN: Formalizing Principia Mathematica using Lean (152 points | 31 comments)
24. Eurorack Knob Idea (290 points | 108 comments)
25. First and 2nd gen Nest Thermostats will lose support in Oct 2025 (50 points | 43 comments)
26. Reading RSS content is a skilled activity (84 points | 44 comments)
27. A $20k American-made electric pickup with no paint, no stereo, no screen (1258 points | 1097 comments)
28. Show HN: Empty Enter Expander – Type less in the terminal with this tool (40 points | 17 comments)
29. Your phone isn't secretly listening to you, but the truth is more disturbing (80 points | 62 comments)
30. Colossal Cave Adventure (1976) (45 points | 18 comments)
